mapper.sql: a.PRoutingId as "proutingid", a.auxUnitCode as "auxUnitCode", a.status as "status", a.cInvCode as "cinvcode", a.cInvName as "cinvname", a.cInvStd as "cinvstd", a.rountingType as "rountingType", a.versionDesc as "versionDesc", a.version as "version", a.ChangeRate as "changeRate", a.versionEffDate as "versionEffDate", a.versionEndDate as "versionEndDate", a.identCode as "identCode", a.identDesc as "identDesc"
